thread.section_title: Asia Business, Finance & Political News - The Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Indonesia Eases Investment Rules

author: I Made Sentana
title: Indonesia Eases Investment Rules
text:
JAKARTA, Indonesia—Indonesia unveiled a second round of measures to ease investment regulations on Tuesday, its latest move to give the beleaguered rupiah a boost and win over skeptical investors in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.
One measure would give exporters an incentive to park their profits onshore, which could help prop up a currency that has fallen almost 19% against the dollar this year amid slowing growth and declining...
